goal.en: This course is designed for new and beginner Salesforce System Administrators looking to increase their skills around the configuration, maintenance, and automation of a Salesforce org. This is also a great opportunity for anyone looking to earn their Salesforce Administrator/Associates credential.
goal.ch: This course is designed for new and beginner Salesforce System Administrators looking to increase their skills around the configuration, maintenance, and automation of a Salesforce org. This is also a great opportunity for anyone looking to earn their Salesforce Administrator/Associates credential.

content.en:
Module 1: Salesforce Fundamentals
Module 2: An Admin’s Job
Module 3: The Big Picture: All Users
Module 4: Feature & Object Access
Module 5: Record Access
Module 6: Customize Standard Functionality
Module 7: Customize the Existing UI
Module 8: Create New With Clicks
Module 9: Declarative Automation
content.ch:
Module 1: Salesforce Fundamentals
Module 2: An Admin’s Job
Module 3: The Big Picture: All Users
Module 4: Feature & Object Access
Module 5: Record Access
Module 6: Customize Standard Functionality
Module 7: Customize the Existing UI
Module 8: Create New With Clicks
Module 9: Declarative Automation

textbook.en: Essentials for New Lightning Experience Administrators (ADX201)
textbook.ch: Essentials for New Lightning Experience Administrators (ADX201)

grading.en: Midterm Exam: 20% Final Exam: 20% Participation, and Attendance: 20% Homework, Exercise: 40%
grading.ch: Midterm Exam: 20% Final Exam: 20% Participation, and Attendance: 20% Homework, Exercise: 40%

flex_desc.en: Students can summarize what they learn this semester and prepare the certification exam.
flex_desc.ch: Students can summarize what they learn this semester and prepare the certification exam.
